message: Is there anything that I'm getting from this that I don't already get from Netflix?
How do I play Amazon content on my Apple TV 2?
Probably not. Netflix may even have an advantage but Amazon wants to take their business.

From what I can tell, Netflix has more options for streaming (compared to what comes free with Amazon's Prime streaming). But if you're not a Netflix customer (or already a Prime member) then Amazon's might be the better option.
Amazon should just buy Netflix and go head to head with Apple.
Google would have a better shot
